VoiceList.Entry: “We put on a really unusual show here. But not today,so come back again sometime and see it.”
“What's your problem? Can't you see we wanna be alone?”
“Geez,what a jerk. Why don't you just leave us alone?”
“You are our 100th couple today… Oh,wait…no you're not… Sorry.”
“You two will play the leads in tonight's show!!”
“Oh,now,it's not hard. Just play it however you want to and the rest of the cast will cover up for you.”
Aeris “This sounds like fun. Come on Cloud,let's do it.”
Tifa “Sounds like fun. Come on Cloud, let's give it a try.”
Yuffie “I don't know what it's all about but sounds kind of cool. Wanna try it,Cloud?”
